product_name: Hoka One One Rapa Nui 2 Tarmac Road-Running Shoes - Men's
long_description: Built to soar down the road, the Hoka One One Rapa Nui 2 Tarmac Road-Running Shoes feature voluminous midsoles to reduce load to the body, and built-in rocker in the forefoot to propel you forward. Polyester air-mesh provides lightweight comfort while lightweight no-sew layered materials provide seamless support. Rapa Nui 2 Tarmac Shoes offer lots of cushioning with 21mm under the balls of the feet and 26mm under the heels. EVA midsoles feature foam that is 30% softer than traditional running shoe foam, and 1.5 times more voluminous; this extra cushioning dissipates shock from heel striking. Balanced stage Meta-Rocker geometry and a low 5mm drop encourage a natural gait and accelerated forward propulsion. A wide outsole profile and a deep Active Foot Frame provide an inherently stable ride. Outsole features high-wear carbon rubber for durability. The Hoka One One Rapa Nui 2 Tarmac Road-Running Shoes have a single-pull lacing system for easy on and off.
short_description: Built to soar down the road, the Hoka One One Rapa Nui 2 Tarmac Road-Running Shoes feature voluminous midsoles to reduce load to the body, and built-in rocker in the forefoot to propel you forward.
